ygData.subject: Re: HIDEN SPELLS maybe important
ygData.msgSnippet: You are probably right... I have a rune called the Rune of Cold.  It doesn t appear on any of the recipe lists for researching spells... now if only we can
ygData.messageBody:
You are probably right... I have a rune called the Rune of Cold. It doesn't
appear on any of the recipe lists for researching spells... now if only we
can find the books which describe how to make them...


-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard [mailto:wizard@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 4:44 AM
To: EQ_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] HIDEN SPELLS maybe important


From: Wizard <wizard@...>

Sombody in anonymus (maybe verant hiden suggestion) posted a very strange
suggestions on vault message board. He say that there exists so called
hiden spells and that until now nobody have found not a one hiden spell an
any server !! That spells have beter mana to damage ratio and are resisted
less.! Anyone know anything about this spells? any indication where to
start searching for them? I have one feeling that this are researchible
spells and you need to do right combination to get them !! SO LETS START
EXPERIMENTING !!
